security.invalid: Invalid characters. Answer may include lowercase and capital letters, numbers and special characters (space " # * + %)
security.maxCharactersQuestion: Security question must be less than 50 characters
security.minCharactersQuestion: Security question must be at least 5 characters long
security.maxCharactersQuestionAnswer: Security question answer must be less than 50 characters
security.required: The field is required to fill out
security.min: Password should contain at least 7 symbols
security.matches: Field should contain uppercase, lowercase, only latin letters and 1 number
